text: Patricia Lee Stotter is an American composer and writer. ==Television work== *Sesame Street *HBO documentaries: Unchained Memories, Reading Your Heart Out, Sometimes I Feel, Three Sisters *PBS documentaries:"Service: When Women Come Marching Home", Spirit to Spirit, Discovering Women, Sugar *Dramas on NBC, CBS and ABC ==Film work== * Interplay *We Are All Prisoners *Fatal Fandango *Battlefield: Home *SERVICE: When Women Come Marching Home www.servicethefilm.com *Justice Deniedhttp://www.justicedeniedmovie.com/ *Is Anybody Listening? www.paulajcaplan.net *Suicide Notes *Sea Womenhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sBb-oofr-7A *"Three Sisters"https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?shva=1#label/archival+links/138c06f1e9bd1f94 *Dramatic Needhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=le9FZAT-hk0 *The Salt Harvesters of Ghanahttp://www.nyu.edu/projects/salt/ *Warriors Return marciarock.com/2013/11/12/warriors-return/ *Bankers Brain www.youtube.com *From the Asheshttp://www.gf.org/fellows/13334-deborah-shaffer *Unfinished Business *Funnyhttp://wwwdb.oscars.org:8100/servlet/impc.NameCredits?vetted=T&name;_in=STOTTER,~PATRICIA~LEE *Unchained Memories *Best Friends:Sisterhoodhttp://www.aptonline.org/catalog.nsf/vLinkTitle/BEST+FRIENDS+THE+POWER+OF+SISTERHOOD *Dads and Daughters *Painting the Town *Spirit to Spirit *"Starving for Sugar"http://blacklight.betech.virginia.edu/catalog/u2109918 ==Theatre== She has composed incidental music and full scores for over 50 plays and musicals including: *"Carbondale Dreams"http://www.dramatists.com/cgi- bin/db/single.asp?index=0&key;=976 *"Beef" *"Resistance" *Anna, the Gypsy Swede *Threads *Perfect Pitch == Awards == * Emmy Award * NY Emmy Award 20Press%20Release%20Oct%2020.pdf * American Cine Eagle * Apple Award * ASCAP Popular Awards * Sundance Film Festival * Tribeca Film Festival * Museum of Modern Art Film Festival == References == Category:American female composers Category:21st-century American composers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century American women musicians Category:21st-century women composers
title: Patricia Lee Stotter
